I am an Assistant Professor at the [Department of Mathematics](http://math.hanyang.ac.kr/) and the [Department of Applied Statistics](http://stat.hanyang.ac.kr/) at [Hanyang University](https://www.hanyang.ac.kr/), South Korea. Prior to joining Hanyang University, I worked as an Assistant Professor at the [Department of Information Statistics](http://stat.chungbuk.ac.kr) at [Chungbuk National University](http://www.cbnu.ac.kr) for two years. I was also a Postdoctoral Research Fellow at the [Pacific Climate Impacts Consortium](https://www.pacificclimate.org/) where I worked under the supervision of Professor [Francis Zwiers](https://www.pacificclimate.org/about-pcic/people/francis-zwiers). I received my Ph.D. in Statistics from Seoul National University under the supervision of Professor [Hee-Seok Oh](https://sites.google.com/site/heeseokoh), and I was a member of [Multiscale Methods in Statistics Lab](https://sites.google.com/view/snumultiscale/home).
